title: Learning Analytics-Based Online Formative Assessment Design and Academic Performance Prediction Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Experience operating online assessment systems, basic statistical analysis skills, and LMS (Learning Management System) management experience
context.additional_context: Simulation-Based Educational Environment for Social Sector Practitioners to Strengthen Job Competencies, Implementing Case-Based Learning with VR

learning_goals: Design a student performance prediction model using online formative assessment data
Apply LMS-collected formative assessment completion rates, time, and score data to analysis processes
Propose personalized learning support strategies based on predictive model results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
